<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The optimization diagnostic interface.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It allows reporting when optimizations are performed and when they are not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// along with the reasons for it.  Hotness information of the corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// code region can be included in the remark if DiagnosticsHotnessRequested is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// enabled in the LLVM context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whether we allow for extra compile-time budget to perform more</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// analysis to produce fewer false positives.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is useful when reporting missed optimizations.  In this case we can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// use the extra analysis (1) to filter trivial false positives or (2) to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// provide more context so that non-trivial false positives can be quickly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// detected by the user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter/#a74b26949a0dd7a5fab2ba1b0da204e50"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter/#a74b26949a0dd7a5fab2ba1b0da204e50">allowExtraAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86loweramxintrinsics-cpp/#adb9257105a403ef9d0773b87693f7779">PassName</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
